otp.group6.audioeditor

Class AudioRecorder

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • otp.group6.audioeditor.AudioRecorder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AudioRecorder
extends java.lang.Thread
    Provides tools for basic audio recording and playback of that recorded file
    Version:
    0.2
    Author:
    Onni Lukkarila
